de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.arraylike

Interface NumberArrayAdapter<N extends Number,A>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - Number type
    A - Array type
    All Superinterfaces:
    ArrayAdapter<N,A>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeWiseBetaNormalization.Adapter, AttributeWiseCDFNormalization.Adapter, DoubleArrayAdapter, FlatMatrixAdapter, FloatArrayAdapter, NumberListArrayAdapter, NumberVectorAdapter, SubsetNumberArrayAdapter, TDoubleListAdapter, VectorAdapter

    public interface NumberArrayAdapter<N extends Number,A>
extends ArrayAdapter<N,A>
    Adapter for arrays of numbers, to avoid boxing.
